@Deprecated

Package com.mongodb.operation

Deprecated.
The core of the MongoDB driver works via operations, using the command pattern. The main Operations supported by MongoDB are in this package, as are helpers and infrastructure required for operation functionality.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AggregateResponseBatchCursor<T> Deprecated.
